item.title: 肯尼亚正与阿联酋 Al Dahra 公司商谈农田租赁事宜
item.description: 肯尼亚正在与阿布扎比的 Al Dahra 公司商讨将农田租赁给该农业综合企业公司的事宜，作为加强东非国家粮食安全计划的一部分。【原文：Kenya is in discussions with Abu Dhabi’s Al Dahra to lease farmland to the agribusiness company as part of plans to boost the East African nation’s food security.】

item.title: 意大利铁路运营商 Ferrovie 将从 Intesa 获得 20 亿欧元贷款
item.description: 意大利国家铁路公司（Ferrovie dello Stato Italiane SpA）将获得意大利联合圣保罗银行（Intesa Sanpaolo SpA）提供的 20 亿欧元（21 亿美元）贷款，这笔贷款将帮助这家国家控制的铁路运营商筹集维护资金并加强基础设施建设。【原文：Italy’s Ferrovie dello Stato Italiane SpA is set to receive a €2 billion ($2.1 billion) loan from Intesa Sanpaolo SpA, which would help the state-controlled rail operator fund maintenance and beef up its infrastructure.】

item.title: 巴里克公司就马里金矿争端提交仲裁申请
item.description: 巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.）正在寻求国际仲裁，以解决与马里政府就其在非洲国家的金矿长达数月之久的争端。【原文：Barrick Gold Corp. is pursuing international arbitration to resolve a monthslong dispute with Mali’s government over its gold mine in the African country.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将开始公布为利率决策提供信息的关键工资指标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行将定期公布其最有价值的欧元区工资增长跟踪器之一，为影响货币政策决策的分析提供洞察力。【原文：The European Central Bank will regularly make available one of its most valued trackers of wage increases in the euro zone, providing insight into the analysis that shapes monetary-policy decisions.】

item.title: 英国电网投资计划将导致消费者账单上涨
item.description: 英国公用事业公司预计将在五年内投资超过 770 亿英镑（约合 980 亿美元）升级电网，这将加重消费者的买单负担。【原文：UK utilities expect to invest more than £77 billion ($98 billion) to upgrade the power grid over five years, increasing the burden on consumers to foot the bill.】

item.title: 印度创纪录的黄金进口量据称是计算错误所致
item.description: 据知情人士透露，黄金进口激增使印度上个月的贸易赤字扩大至创纪录水平，并将卢比推至历史最低点，其原因是计算错误。【原文：A surge in gold imports that widened India’s trade deficit to a record last month and pushed the rupee to an all-time low was due to an error in calculation, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Taconic 退出商业地产，部门主管加入 Axonic
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Taconic Capital Advisors 正在结束其商业房地产业务，并就将该部门旗下的一只基金出售给 Axonic Capital 事宜进行深入谈判。【原文：Taconic Capital Advisors is winding down its commercial real estate operation and is in advanced talks to sell one of the unit’s funds to Axonic Capital, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 德国称预计联合信贷银行将出售德国商业银行股份
item.description: 在意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）宣布进一步使用金融衍生品来加强其控制权数小时后，德国政府加强了对该银行收购德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）的批评，并呼吁该银行减持股份。【原文：The German government strengthened its criticism of UniCredit SpA’s pursuit of Commerzbank AG and called on the Italian bank to reduce its stake hours after it announced the further use of derivatives to increase its control.】

item.title: 美国多户住宅开工率降至四个月低点
item.description: 由于多户住宅项目的减少缓解了独户住宅开工率的回升，特别是在暴风雨肆虐的南部地区，美国 11 月份的新屋建设出人意料地出现下滑。【原文：US new-home construction unexpectedly fell in November as a drop in multifamily projects mitigated a rebound in starts of single-family houses, particularly in the storm-ravaged South.】

item.title: 丹麦警告俄罗斯可能派遣军舰护航油轮
item.description: 丹麦警告说，俄罗斯海军可能开始护送所谓的 "影子舰队 "油轮通过丹麦海峡，以升级对北约国家的挑衅。【原文：Denmark warned that Russia’s navy may start escorting the so-called shadow fleet tankers through Danish straits to escalate provocations against NATO countries.】

item.title: 波兰对销售白俄罗斯化肥的公司实施制裁
item.description: 波兰对另外三家涉嫌销售格罗德诺阿佐特公司在白俄罗斯生产的化肥的公司实施了新的制裁，以保护本国生产商免受廉价进口产品的冲击。【原文：Poland imposed fresh sanctions on three more companies allegedly selling fertilizers made in Belarus by Grodno Azot as it seeks to shield its local producers from cheaper imports.】

item.title: 交易员不再完全认为英国央行明年会降息两次
item.description: 有迹象表明，物价上涨压力巨大，因此只需采取谨慎的货币宽松政策，投资者不再完全相信英国央行明年会降息两个季度。【原文：Investors are no longer fully pricing two quarter-point interest-rate cuts from the Bank of England next year amid signs of sticky price pressures that make the case for only cautious monetary easing.】

item.title: Silicon Valley’s Secondary Markets Are Bigger Than Ever
item.description: Who needs an IPO? OpenAI, Stripe, Databricks and SpaceX have found a different way to get employees paid.

item.title: 麦格理正在考虑以 50 亿美元的价格出售 Altafiber
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，麦格理集团（Macquarie Group Ltd.）正开始探索战略选择，包括出售前身为辛辛那提贝尔（Cincinnati Bell）的电信运营商 Altafiber。【原文：Macquarie Group Ltd. is beginning to explore strategic options including a sale for Altafiber, the telecommunications carrier formerly known as Cincinnati Bell, as appetite surges for companies offering broadband internet services, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 石油交易员向特朗普敬酒，但对他对市场意味着什么意见不一
item.description:
美国当选总统对关税的支持引发了人们对贸易战侵蚀需求的担忧，而其他人则对贸易战带来的波动表示欢迎。【原文：

The US president-elect’s support for tariffs raises concerns about a trade war eroding demand, while others welcome an injection of volatility.

】

item.title: Germany Asks EU to Ease Sustainability Reporting Amid Downturn
item.description: Germany has asked the European Union to soften its rules on sustainability reporting for companies as the bloc’s largest economy grapples with a downturn, according to people familiar with the matter.

item.title: General Mills Lowers Profit Outlook on Price Cuts
item.description: Cheerios maker General Mills Inc. lowered its profit outlook for fiscal 2025 in order to invest in price reductions to drive sales.

item.title: 开云集团有望在 2025 年初完成房地产交易以减轻债务负担
item.description: 开云集团（Kering SA）预计不久将获得一笔外部投资，用于建立一个新实体，以容纳其房地产资产，其中包括位于米兰、纽约和巴黎的价值约 40 亿欧元（42 亿美元）的房产。【原文：Kering SA expects to soon secure outside investment for a new entity that would house its real estate assets — including about €4 billion ($4.2 billion) worth of properties in Milan, New York and Paris — as the Gucci owner looks to cut its debt load.】

item.title: 光速公司支持克罗地亚初创企业制造不依赖中国的无人机
item.description:
中国打击出口可能有助于 Orqa 等无人机供应商

。【原文：

A Chinese crackdown on exports could help drone suppliers like Orqa

】

item.title: Nigeria Banks on Higher Oil Revenue to Fund Record Budget
item.description: Nigerian President Bola Tinubu is banking on an increase in oil revenue to help fund record spending outlined in the 2025 budget that he presented to parliament on Wednesday.

item.title: 美联储利率路径更新有了新的观察者：特朗普的财政部长人选
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的一名经济学编辑，今天我们将关注维克多利亚-丹德里努（Viktoria Dendrinou）关于美国财政窘境的报道。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re looking at Viktoria Dendrinou’s reporting on the US fiscal quandary. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 美国石墨生产商寻求美国征收巨额关税以抵御中国
item.description: 这里有一个思考练习：如果唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要对从中国和世界其他国家进口的商品征收的关税还远远不够呢？【原文：Here’s a thought exercise for you: What if the tariffs Donald Trump is threatening on imports from China and the rest of the world aren’t anywhere near big enough?】

item.title: M&A Momentum and Trump Trades: Dealmakers’ Predictions for 2025
item.description: Mergers and acquisition activity rebounded in 2024, as access to cheaper financing released a pent-up demand to do deals after two down years.

item.title: Trump Tariff Risk Casts Doubt on IPO Blowout Forecast for 2025
item.description: Stock markets have been cheering the return of Donald Trump and shrugging off the prospect of tariffs that he’s long promised to impose on America’s biggest trading partners.

item.title: Saudi Arabia Taps Aramco Oil Field Brine in Lithium Battery Push
item.description: Saudi Arabia is exploring projects that can produce lithium for batteries in an effort to ramp up production in the Middle Eastern oil exporter.

item.title: 默克与中国达成近 20 亿美元的肥胖症药物协议
item.description: 默克公司（Merck & Co.【原文：Merck & Co. snagged a potential drug in the burgeoning market for obesity medications in a deal worth as much as $2 billion.】

item.title: 美联储决议前夕，股票买家潜伏其间
item.description: 过去一周，人们越来越担心美国股市的宽幅震荡已经抑制了标准普尔500指数（S&P 500）的强劲涨势，但事实证明，股票多头仍在美联储利率决议前抢购股票。【原文：While concern has grown in the past week that narrowing breadth in the US stock market has tapped the brakes on the S&P 500’s blistering rally, it turns out that stock bulls are still stepping in to snap up shares ahead of the Fed rate decision.】

item.title: 伦敦房租以创纪录的速度上涨 加剧了劳工压力
item.description: 伦敦的住房租金正在以有史以来最快的速度飙升，而这一趋势的再次出现加深了该市租户所面临的危机。【原文：Housing rents in London are soaring at the fastest pace on record after a resurgence that deepens the crisis facing the city’s tenants.】

item.title: 经济困境持续，瑞典政府下调增长预期
item.description: 瑞典财政部下调了对 2026 年之前经济反弹速度的预测，理由是这个北欧最大经济体的长期疲软以及全球不确定性的增加。【原文：Sweden’s Finance Ministry lowered its forecast for the pace of an economic rebound through 2026, citing a protracted weakness in the largest Nordic economy and increased global uncertainty.】

item.title: 2025 年，办公楼房地产将面临 "清算之年
item.description:
长期以来，业界一直推迟承认房地产价值的下降。账单即将到期。另附：苏俄词汇表。【原文：

The industry has long postponed recognition of falling property values. The bill is coming due. Plus: a Seussian glossary.

】
